faas.title: Freelancer as a Service (FaaS)
faas.description: FaaS (Freelancer as a Service) is not a network of freelancers, but a consolidated work team with more than four years of experience collaborating together. Our model adapts to the growth and needs of each client, strategically expanding the team according to project requirements. We always maintain direct control of the team, tasks, and in-house projects, ensuring efficient management without resorting to subcontracting or outsourcing.
